attributes.action: Abort his attempt to implement the abolishment of parliament act
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Given the general cynicism of the public  with regards to the state of democracy in this country, removing the duty of parliament to debate and decide on new laws is undemocratic in the extreme. 

It is so insidious that the 'enabling' factor of the new law even applies to itself, so it could be used to remove any 'democratic restraints' put into the law by the opposition or the house of lords.
